mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.id, A.name, A.signature_menu_id signatureMenuId, A.info, A.order_type orderType FROM SHOP A JOIN DELIVERY_LOCATION B ON A.id = B.shop_id WHERE A.work_condition = 'OPEN' AND A.status != 'DELETE' AND B.town_code LIKE CONCAT(#{townCode}, '%') AND A.signature_menu_id = #{categoryId}
